title: mygardenthing
description: Automate the gardening water system based on weather prediction, temperature and soil humidity

temperature.title: Temperature
temperature.description: A number value based on the weather prediction api between -20°C to 60°C

soilHumidity.title: Humidty of Soil
soilHumidity.description: A number value used to measure the humdity of the soil in percentage

humidityThreshold.title: Humidty Threshold
humidityThreshold.description: A number value used to set the threshold for humdity of the soil in percentage

state.title: State of the system
state.description: Describes the state of the system for watering

tooDry.title: Low Humidity
tooDry.description: It is fired when the humidity reaches the set humidityThreshold

tooWet.title: High Humidity
tooWet.description: It is fired when the humidity reaches 90 percent
